item.description:
Come and enjoy the Japanese cherry-blossom viewing party this FRIDAY at Ashdown House (Bldg. NW35)!

 

Cherry-blossom viewing party

1. Get a Sushi box for $5 and other Japanese food for $2!

2. Enjoy Japanese games for free!

3. Win Red Sox tickets and airline coupons!

4. Fundraising for Japan relief

 

Time: 6-8PM on Aprl 15th (FRIDAY)

Come early or very limited selection!

 

Place: Ashdown House (Hulsizer Room)

http://whereis.mit.edu/?go=NW35

 

Admission: FREE

 

Featured Food & Activities:

Sushi $5

Yakisoba(noodles) $2

Tonjiru(soup) $2

Oshiruko(dessert) $2

Chopsticks game

Japanese toys

Irritating maze

 

Cherry-blossom viewing party is hosted by Japanese Association of MIT

Co-sponsored by ASA LEF / ARCADE

Supported by IACE Travel and Mainichi Communications

 

****IF YOU'RE INTERESTED IN HELPING THIS EVENT, PLEASE LET ME KNOW. THANKS!*****
item.why: Come and enjoy the Japanese cherry-blossom viewing party at MIT
item.name: Ohanami at MIT
